advantages.item1_text: Free delivery anywhere in the city ‚Äî at any time.
advantages.item2_text: Honest pricing with zero surprises. Transparent terms.
advantages.item3_text: Hire with a professional driver ‚Äî convenient and safe.

catalog_content.heading: REIZ fleet: from comfort to premium class

editor_block.title: Car Rental in Lviv by REIZ: Transparent, Reliable, & Detail-Oriented
editor_block.text:
At REIZ, we don't just hand over keys; we ensure your mobility. We offer seamless car delivery across Lviv and can transport vehicles to any location in Ukraine upon request.

Our fleet is curated to meet every need: prestigious premium models for business, rugged SUVs for mountain adventures, and spacious minivans for family trips. Even if you're looking for an economy option, we prioritize newer models that offer a level of comfort and safety well above the standard.

Rental Plans: Choose Your Pace

The Daily Drive: Try Before You Commit

The daily rate is the perfect low-pressure test drive. Take a car for 24 hours to see how it handles Lviv's cobblestones or the highway. Is parking easy? Do your suitcases fit? Do you love the sound of the engine? One day is usually enough to decide whether to extend for a month or switch to a different class. Many of our clients grab a car for a day just to test it before a weekend trip to the Carpathians - the steep climbs to Slavske or the winding roads to Bukovel will quickly tell you if it's the right ride for your holiday.

The Weekly Getaway

A weekly rental offers the best balance of price and freedom. One fixed rate, seven days, and zero waiting for taxis. A week gives you the flexibility to mix city business with leisure: explore the castles of the Lviv region, tour the wine roads, or head into the mountains. It gives you more time to get comfortable with the car than a daily rental, and extending your booking is simple if you decide to stay longer.

Monthly Rental: The Long-Stay Solution

Perfect for projects, business trips, or relocation. You get a significantly lower daily rate and a single, predictable payment. This format is designed for regular business travel: Lviv to Kyiv commutes, or client visits in Ternopil, Ivano-Frankivsk, and Rivne. One car covers everything - office runs, meetings, moving boxes, or picking up partners. Plans changed? Extending the term or swapping the car is hassle-free.

Long-Term Subscription (3+ Months)

Forget the hassle of buying, selling, or maintaining a vehicle. Long-term rental (3 to 12+ months) gives you a personal car with a fixed monthly budget. It's convenient and economical. You have a car ready for daily tasks and intercity travel without worrying about depreciation or service costs. It allows you to plan your budget months ahead, and if your needs change - say, you need an SUV for winter instead of a sedan - we can swap the model.

üöÄ Coming Soon: Economy Class

We heard you, and we're expanding! Very soon, we will open bookings for economical, maneuverable cars starting from just $20/day. Want to be the first to know? Leave a request, and we'll notify you as soon as the Economy fleet is ready. In the meantime, check out our Comfort Class special offers - you might find a higher level of safety and features for a price that surprises you.

Why Choose REIZ?

  • Seamless Booking: Our website is built for humans - fast filters, real photos, and accurate specs.
  • Instant Processing: We respect your time; booking takes just a couple of minutes.
  • Flexible Delivery: We bring the car to you - LWO Airport, the train station, your hotel, or any address in the city.
  • No Hidden Fees: The price you see is the price you pay. No surprises at checkout.
  • Total Flexibility: Need to extend? Want to swap cars? We make it easy.
  • Reliable Fleet: We are obsessive about maintenance. Clean interiors, timely service, and seasonal tires are non-negotiable.
  • 24/7 Support: Real people, ready to help in UA, EN, RU, or HE.
  • Ukraine-Wide: We don't just stop at the city limits. Intercity delivery and returns are available on request.

Additional Services

No Deposit / Reduced Deposit

We know a massive deposit isn't always convenient. We offer rental options without a deposit or with a 50% reduction for specific models. Eligibility depends on your driving experience and the car class - you'll see all the details clearly during booking.

Chauffeur Service

Want the comfort without the driving? Book a car with a professional driver. We'll handle the airport transfer, hotel drop-off, or business logistics while you relax.

Delivery & Return

In Lviv: Free. We deliver to the center, any district, the railway station, or the airport at no extra cost (client only covers airport parking).
Outside Lviv: Calculated based on mileage. We can deliver anywhere in Ukraine.
Returns: Free within city limits.

Useful Add-ons

  • Navigation: All cars feature Apple CarPlay & Android Auto. Just plug in your phone and use your favorite maps.
  • Child Seats: Available upon request for all ages.
  • Crossing Borders: Possible with prior approval (we handle the documents and insurance).
  • Unlimited Mileage: Available for many models - check the "Unlimited" tag when booking.

Condition: Pristine & Ready

We take pride in the condition of our fleet. Your safety is our obsession.

Pre-Drive Check: Brakes, lights, tire pressure, fluids - every car goes through a strict checklist before it reaches you.

Cleanliness: We deliver cars fresh. Dry/wet cleaning of the interior and a washed body are standard. Deep cleaning is performed whenever necessary.

Maintenance: We stick to the schedule. Genuine parts, partner service centers, and zero delays on maintenance.

Safety Tips for the Road

Once you're in the driver's seat, safety is in your hands. Here are a few friendly reminders to keep your trip smooth:

The 3-Second Rule

Keep your distance. Pick a landmark (a sign or pole) on the road. When the car ahead passes it, count "one-two-three." If you pass the mark before you finish counting, back off a bit. That gap is your reaction time.

Lane Changes

  • Check Blind Spots: Mirrors are great, but a quick glance over your shoulder is better.
  • Signal Early: Let others know what you're doing before you start turning the wheel.
  • Be Smooth: One maneuver, one lane. Don't dart across multiple lanes at once.
  • Watch for Two Wheels: Scooters and motorcycles can easily hide in your blind spots.

Read the Signs

Traffic signs are the language of the road. If a junction looks confusing or you miss a sign, it's better to slow down and figure it out than to rush.

Zero Tolerance

We are strict on this: Driving under the influence is prohibited. REIZ adheres to a zero-tolerance policy regarding alcohol. It's about your safety and the safety of everyone around you.

faq.group1_item1_answer: Lviv has many paid zones and municipal parking lots. Always park within marked lines or in guarded parking areas, check road signs and parking meters, and keep receipts. Improper parking results in fines paid by the renter. In areas with limited parking, use shopping mall or hotel parking. It is useful to install city apps for parking payment and zone navigation. Before leaving the car overnight, check local courtyard/street rules to avoid towing.
faq.group1_item1_question: Where to park a rental car in Lviv and how to avoid fines?
faq.group1_item2_answer: We provide delivery/return to any address in Lviv and meet you at the LWO terminal at the agreed time. Extra charges may apply for early/late hours and waiting time, final price depends on distance. Intercity delivery across Ukraine is also available on request. To ensure timely service, book in advance and provide your flight/hotel details. Want to speed up the process? Book online at REIZ Rental Cars ‚Äî it‚Äôs more convenient and locks in your rate.
faq.group1_item2_question: Car delivery to an address and Lviv Airport (LWO): conditions and prices
faq.group1_item3_answer: A daily mileage limit applies (usually 250‚Äì300 km/day), which is enough for business and tourist routes around Lviv and the region. For longer trips (e.g., Lviv‚ÄìKyiv or Lviv‚ÄìOdesa), add the extended or unlimited mileage option when booking. Exceeding the limit is charged at a fixed rate per kilometer according to tariffs. Inform us about your route in advance ‚Äî we‚Äôll suggest the best option and where to refuel along the way.
faq.group1_item3_question: Is there a mileage limit and how to book a trip across Ukraine without restrictions?
faq.group2_item1_answer: Rental includes mandatory liability insurance and standard Casco with a deductible. Liability covers third-party damages, Casco covers damage to the rental car above the deductible. Certain cases (e.g., glass/tires) may have special conditions ‚Äî clarify during booking in the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù section. In case of an accident, record the incident and call the authorities immediately. Extended coverage reduces your risks and helps close cases faster.
faq.group2_item1_question: What does insurance cover and how does it help on the road? (Liability/Casco)
faq.group2_item2_answer: The deductible is the maximum amount you pay in case of damage; insurance covers the rest. The deposit is the amount blocked on your card during the rental, usually equal to the deductible. Example: damage = 50,000 UAH, deductible/deposit = 20,000 UAH ‚Äî your responsibility is 20,000 UAH, the rest is covered by insurance. The deposit is released after returning the car undamaged; release time depends on the bank and usually takes a few days.
faq.group2_item2_question: Deductible vs. deposit: what‚Äôs the difference and how much do you risk?
faq.group2_item3_answer:
Renting without a deposit is not possible.

By default, a deposit equal to the deductible is blocked (depends on car class). You may reduce your responsibility by choosing:

  • ‚àí50% deposit/deductible (CDW);
  • ‚àí100% deposit/‚Äúzero liability‚Äù (SCDW) for damage/theft.

Important: even with ‚Äúzero liability‚Äù there is a mandatory hold of $200‚Äì300 (depending on model) for:

  • fines and tolls,
  • missing fuel,
  • car wash/interior cleaning,
  • lost keys.

This hold is not for damages and is refunded after clearing possible charges. Choose the right package when booking ‚Äî we‚Äôll suggest the best option for rentals in Lviv and trips across Ukraine.
faq.group2_item3_question: Can I rent without a deposit and how does ‚Äúzero liability‚Äù work?
faq.group3_item1_answer: Basic requirements: from 21 years old with at least 2 years of driving experience. For business/premium cars: 23‚Äì25 years old and at least 5 years of experience. If you don‚Äôt fully meet the requirements, a ‚Äúyoung driver‚Äù program is available for an extra fee. All drivers must be listed in the rental agreement: prepare documents and provide additional driver details in advance to avoid refusal at pickup.
faq.group3_item1_question: Minimum age and driving experience for renting in Lviv and Ukraine
faq.group3_item2_answer: Driving within Ukraine is unrestricted, but leaving the country is possible only with company‚Äôs written permission and a ‚ÄúGreen Card‚Äù insurance. Time is needed for processing and checking the route/borders. Crossing borders without approval is prohibited, voids insurance, and leads to penalties. Planning a foreign trip? Inform us in advance ‚Äî we‚Äôll check requirements, prepare documents, and advise on timing.
faq.group3_item2_question: Can I drive outside Ukraine with a rental car?
faq.group3_item3_answer: Only drivers listed in the contract are allowed to drive the car. Passing the car to third parties, using it for taxi, carsharing, or courier services is prohibited and voids insurance. Need a second driver? Add them to the contract ‚Äî it‚Äôs legal and safe. Violations result in contractual fines and full financial liability in case of an incident.
faq.group3_item3_question: Giving the car to third parties and using it for taxi/carsharing: what is prohibited
faq.group4_item1_answer: We accept payments in cash (UAH, USD, EUR), Visa/Mastercard cards, bank transfer, and ‚Äî upon prior agreement ‚Äî cryptocurrency (USDT/USDC). Currency/crypto payments follow the company‚Äôs rate at the time of transaction; bank and network fees may apply. Payments are available in Lviv and for delivery across Ukraine. The deposit is blocked on the renter‚Äôs card at pickup and released after returning the car undamaged. Release time depends on the bank (usually a few business days). For companies ‚Äî invoices and closing documents are provided.
faq.group4_item1_question: What payment methods are available and how is the deposit taken?
faq.group4_item2_answer: Required: passport/ID card, driver‚Äôs license category B (at least 2 years), and a bank card in the renter‚Äôs name. Foreign citizens are advised to have an International Driving Permit (IDP) along with their national license ‚Äî this makes verification easier. If planning a rental in Lviv during weekends or holidays, book in advance ‚Äî document checks are faster and car selection is wider (see ‚ÄúRestrictions and Prohibitions‚Äù).
faq.group4_item2_question: What documents are required for renting in Lviv: locals and foreigners?
faq.group4_item3_answer: Cars are provided with a full tank and must be returned refueled to full. If not, missing fuel and a refueling service fee are charged at company rates. Refuel before return, keep the receipt ‚Äî this avoids questions at handover. For those planning active trips around Lviv with early departures/late returns, plan your refueling and timing in advance.
faq.group4_item3_question: ‚ÄúFull-to-full‚Äù fuel policy: how to return a car without extra charges

faqPage.main_title: Frequently Asked Questions About Car Rental
faqPage.faq_pretitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about car rental with REIZ.

questions.question: CAN I RENT A CAR OVERNIGHT?
questions.answer: Yes, nighttime pick-up and return are available 24/7. You can start or finish the rental late at night or early in the morning ‚Äî please agree the exact time with a manager in advance. Night delivery/return may include an after-hours service fee.

questions.question: CAN I RENT A CAR FOR MORE THAN A MONTH?
questions.answer: Yes. Long-term rentals (30+ days) come with reduced rates and monthly payments. Scheduled maintenance is on us. Ask a manager for a tailored quote.

questions.question: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM AGE AND DRIVING EXPERIENCE?
questions.answer: Typically from 21 years old and 2+ years of driving. For crossovers and premium class, requirements are higher ‚Äî from 25 years old. If you don‚Äôt meet age/experience, a Young Driver fee may apply.

questions.question: DO I HAVE TO REFUEL ON THE FIRST DAY?
questions.answer: We use a Full-to-Full policy: you receive the car with a full tank and return it full. If refueling before return isn‚Äôt possible, a prepaid fuel option is available.

questions.question: I HAD AN ACCIDENT ‚Äî WHAT SHOULD I DO?
questions.answer: Ensure safety, call us 24/7 and the police (102), and do not leave the scene. Take photos/videos and, if applicable, complete the European accident statement. Your liability depends on the chosen coverage (CDW/SCDW). See the Insurance section for details.

questions.question: WHAT DOCUMENTS DO I NEED TO RENT A CAR?
questions.answer: Passport, valid driving licence, and a bank card. Foreign drivers may need an International Driving Permit (IDP) in addition to their national licence.

questions.question: HOW CAN I PAY FOR THE RENTAL?
questions.answer: By Visa/Mastercard (including Apple Pay/Google Pay) or cash. The deposit is pre-authorised on the card or taken in cash and released after all charges are closed.

questions.question: CAN I ADD AN ADDITIONAL DRIVER?
questions.answer: Yes, if their data is added to the contract and documents are provided. Age and driving-experience requirements are the same as for the main driver.

questions.question: IS SMOKING ALLOWED IN THE CAR?
questions.answer: No, smoking is prohibited. Violation incurs a fine and interior cleaning charge according to the rental terms.

questions.question: HOW IS THE SECURITY DEPOSIT TAKEN?
questions.answer: Typically via card pre-authorisation or cash by agreement. The amount depends on the car class and selected insurance coverage.

questions.question: CAN I PICK UP IN KYIV AND RETURN IN ANOTHER CITY?
questions.answer: Yes, one-way returns are available for an intercity transfer fee. Route and timing must be agreed in advance.

questions.question: IS THERE A MILEAGE LIMIT?
questions.answer: Daily rates usually include a mileage limit (e.g., 250‚Äì300 km/day). Excess mileage is charged per km. Increased or unlimited mileage options are available.

questions.question: DO YOU DELIVER TO ADDRESSES AND TO LVIV AIRPORT (LWO)?
questions.answer: Yes. We can deliver to your address in the city and meet you at the airport. Pricing depends on zone and time of day. Intercity delivery is available upon request.

questions.question: ARE CHILD SEATS/BOOSTERS AVAILABLE?
questions.answer: Yes, on prior request. Options are available for different age groups. A small extra fee may apply ‚Äî check when booking.

questions.question: CAN I TRAVEL WITH PETS?
questions.answer: Yes, provided cleanliness is maintained (use a carrier or cover). Extra cleaning fees may apply for heavy soiling or odours.

questions.question: WHAT ARE THE CANCELLATION/RESCHEDULING RULES?
questions.answer: Free cancellation is available in advance within the stated window (usually 24‚Äì48 hours). Late cancellation or no-show may incur a fee. Date changes are possible subject to availability.

questions.question: IN WHAT CONDITION SHOULD I RETURN THE CAR?
questions.answer: As received: roadworthy, clean, and with a full tank. Heavy soiling may require paid washing/detailing. Please check you haven‚Äôt left personal items.

questions.question: HOW ARE FINES, TOLLS, AND PARKING CHARGES HANDLED?
questions.answer: Charges incurred during the rental are settled after the trip. If needed, they may be deducted from the deposit. Final settlement timing depends on data from authorities and the bank.

questions.question: DO I NEED AN INTERNATIONAL DRIVING PERMIT?
questions.answer: Foreign drivers may need an IDP in addition to their national licence (especially if it‚Äôs not in Latin script). Ukrainian residents need a national licence of the established format.

questions.question: WHAT CAR CLASSES ARE AVAILABLE AND WHAT ARE THE APPROXIMATE PRICES?
questions.answer: Economy, standard, crossovers, and premium are available. Price depends on class, rental duration, and season. The longer the rental, the lower the daily rate. Check current rates in the fleet or with a manager.

hero.title: Rental Car Insurance
hero.text: When choosing a rental car, it's important to plan for possible issues on the road. Our insurance packages help you reduce risks and protect yourself from extra expenses.

premium.name: Premium
premium.deposit: $200‚Äì$300 ‚Äî applied only in case of fines or fuel shortage

eligibility.title: ELIGIBILITY FOR EXTENDED COVERAGE
items: Drivers aged 25+ with at least 4 years of experience.
Rental period must be from 3 days and longer.
The person on the rental agreement must be the one driving.
In case of an accident, notify the company within one hour and call the police.

exclusions.title: NOT COVERED & PROHIBITED
items: Driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
Allowing an unauthorized driver. Third parties at the wheel.
Theft of external parts such as mirrors or wipers.
Leaving the scene of an accident.
Using the car for commercial purposes (taxi, sub-rental). Strictly prohibited.
Damage to the vehicle‚Äôs interior.

downloads.title: DOWNLOADS
downloads.note: YOU CAN VIEW THE FULL LIST OF LIMITATIONS AND NON-INSURED CASES IN THE DOCUMENT

breach.title: BREACH OF RENTAL TERMS
breach.text: Many situations related to non-compliance with the rental agreement mean that extended insurance will not cover the damage. Even with full protection, the renter must follow the company‚Äôs rules.

explainer.title: WHAT IS ADDITIONAL INSURANCE?
explainer.text: Every rental car comes with basic mandatory insurance (TPL) covering third-party liability. Additional insurance significantly reduces your financial responsibility in case of an accident, theft, or total loss of the vehicle.

features.title: SCDW
features.subtitle: full coverage
features.desc: Maximum reduction or full waiver of liability

features.title: TP
features.subtitle: theft protection
features.desc: Protection against theft or total vehicle loss

accident.title: WHAT TO DO IN CASE OF AN ACCIDENT?

steps.title: Pull over
steps.text: Turn on your hazard lights and place the warning triangle.

steps.title: Call the police
steps.text: Dial 102 to file an official accident report.

steps.title: Contact us
steps.text: Call our office within 1 hour of the incident.

steps.title: Document everything
steps.text: Take photos of the scene, damage, and other vehicles‚Äô license plates.

roadside.title: 24/7 ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE
roadside.text: When you pick up your rental, you'll receive a personal assistant number to call 24/7 in case of a breakdown, accident, or any emergency.

terms.title: TERMS OF USE
terms.driverRequirementsAge: Minimum driver age is 21 years, minimum driving experience is 2 years.
terms.driverRequirementsNote: For some vehicles, the minimum driver age is 24 years.
terms.text: After payment we'll email the certificate to you, or arrange courier delivery at a convenient time and place ‚Äî simply enable ¬´I want a physical certificate¬ª.

checkout.title: PAYMENT
checkout.description: After payment we'll email the certificate to you, or contact you to arrange delivery at a convenient time and place ‚Äì simply enable ¬´I want a physical certificate¬ª

form.consent: By clicking ¬´Proceed to payment¬ª, you accept the personal data processing terms.

items.q: Do I need to book a car in advance when using a certificate?
items.aHtml: Yes, we recommend booking a car in advance. The certificate confirms the amount or rental rights but does not automatically reserve a specific vehicle. Popular models may be unavailable, especially on weekends and holidays.

items.q: What if the desired car is unavailable on the requested dates?
items.aHtml: In that case, we will offer an alternative vehicle of a similar class or help you find other convenient dates. The certificate retains its value and can be used later.

items.q: Can I use the certificate in parts or only for one rental?
items.aHtml: The certificate can be used for one or several rentals depending on its value. If the rental cost is less than the certificate amount, the remaining balance is preserved and can be used later.

items.q: Can I exchange the certificate for cash?
items.aHtml: The certificate cannot be exchanged for cash. It can only be used for car rental within the available fleet.

items.q: Who can use the gift certificate?
items.aHtml: The certificate can be used by the person whose name it was issued to. If you want to transfer the certificate to another person, please contact us in advance ‚Äî we will reissue the certificate and update the driver's name in the system. The certificate can be used by a driver who meets the age requirements and minimum driving experience specified in the rental terms.

hero.title: List your car for rent in Lviv
hero.intro: Turn your car into a source of income without handling day-to-day operations. Our experienced team manages everything for you.

why.title: WHY IT‚ÄôS BENEFICIAL
items: Invest in a growing car-rental market without extra hassle. We handle the full cycle ‚Äî from listing to vehicle return.
Your car generates income ‚Äî payouts are transferred to your account monthly according to the agreement.
Regular maintenance, inspections and monitoring ‚Äî to keep your car earning without downtime or unexpected failures.
Full control: track the vehicle status via your personal account. All processes are transparent and automated.
Rentals are covered by an official agreement. All legal aspects and paperwork meet established standards.

requirements.title: VEHICLE REQUIREMENTS FOR LISTING
items: Vehicle no older than 3 years
Technically sound and fully serviced
Valid third-party liability insurance (CASCO comprehensive optional)
The car must be legally clean ‚Äî no liens/restrictions and not reported stolen

form.title: SUBMIT A LISTING REQUEST
form.text: Fill out the form so we can estimate the potential yield of your vehicle and contact you to clarify the details.

loyalty.title: Loyalty program
loyalty.subtitle: The more you rent ‚Äî the better the deal. After each completed rental your personal discount is updated automatically.
loyalty.note:
The loyalty discount applies to the base rental price and can be combined with seasonal promotions according to the current offer terms.
Does not apply to deposit, insurance, add-on services, delivery/return, and other associated fees.

addOns.title: Add-on services
addOns.subtitle: Choose the options you need when booking or picking up the car.

items.name: Wi-Fi router
items.description: Unlimited 4G mobile internet on the road

items.name: Additional driver
items.description: Adding a second driver to the rental agreement

items.name: Full tank
items.description: Car is provided with a full tank. If returned with less fuel ‚Äî a fuel charge + service fee applies

items.name: Infant seat
items.description: For children up to 13 kg (up to ~1 year)

oneWay.title: One-Way service
oneWay.text: A convenient option for intercity trips: pick up the car in one location and return it in another. The service cost depends on the route and vehicle class ‚Äî the exact amount will be confirmed by a manager when booking.
oneWay.menuDesc: Depends on route and vehicle class

mileage.title: Mileage terms
mileage.subtitle:
Daily mileage limit is 300 km, calculated cumulatively for the entire rental period, but no more than 5,000 km per month.
In case of exceeding the limit, each kilometer is charged additionally according to company rates.
mileage.note: Need a higher limit or unlimited mileage? Contact our manager.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.subtitle: A guarantee amount blocked on your bank card when picking up the vehicle. The deposit amount depends on the vehicle class and insurance terms.
items: Blocked on a card issued in the renter's name
Released by REIZ within one business day after return
Actual refund ‚Äî 1 to 14 banking days
With CDW / SCDW, the deposit amount may be reduced

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.subtitle: Every vehicle has mandatory insurance coverage. Additionally, you can choose extended protection.

items.text: mandatory third-party liability insurance included in the rental price. Covers liability to third parties.
partial body damage coverage. Reduces the renter's financial liability to a fixed deductible.
full coverage without deductible. The renter bears no financial liability for damage or theft.

driver.title: Who can drive
items: Only the person named in the rental agreement is authorized to drive. Transferring the vehicle to unauthorized persons is prohibited.
If multiple drivers are planned ‚Äî use the ¬´Additional driver¬ª service. Each driver will be added to the agreement upon providing documents.

delivery.title: Pick-up and return
delivery.subtitle: The car is provided clean, with a full tank and a complete set of documents. It should be returned in the same condition.
delivery.washDesc: If the car is returned in a dirty condition
delivery.note: The car is provided with a full tank. Upon return the tank must be refilled to the same level, otherwise the fuel cost + service fee will be deducted from the deposit.

territory.title: Usage territory
items: The vehicle may be used throughout Ukraine, except for temporarily occupied territories and combat zones.
Travel outside Ukraine is possible only with prior written approval from REIZ. The list of permitted countries can be clarified when booking.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and booking changes
items: Free cancellation or changes ‚Äî no later than 24 hours before the scheduled pick-up time.
Cancellation less than 24 hours in advance may incur a compensation fee. Details available when booking.

contract.title: Rental agreement
contract.text: The rental is formalized based on a public agreement. It contains the rights and obligations of both parties, liability terms, and dispute resolution procedures. Signing takes place upon vehicle pick-up.

meta.title: Top 4 Routes from Lviv for Instagram Photos | REIZ
meta.description: Where to find Instagram-worthy views and when to go to avoid crowds. Golden Horseshoe, Tustan, Tarakaniv Fort, Synevir.
meta.og_title: Top 4 Routes from Lviv for Instagram Photos | REIZ
meta.og_description: Where to find Instagram-worthy views and when to go to avoid crowds. Golden Horseshoe, Tustan, Tarakaniv Fort, Synevir.

blogLvivTravel.title: Top 4 Routes from Lviv: Where to Find Instagram-Worthy Views and When to Go to Avoid Crowds
blogLvivTravel.hero_alt: Lake Synevir in the Carpathians ‚Äî best photo destination from Lviv

intro.p1: Lviv region is a ready-made movie set. Here you'll find locations in the style of "Bridgerton", mystical ruins like in The Last of Us, and rocks reminiscent of "Game of Thrones" landscapes.
intro.p2: But there's a catch: the most beautiful shots are taken at sunrise or sunset when tourist buses haven't arrived yet or have already left. To catch that perfect light and fog, you need freedom of movement.
intro.p3: We at REIZ have compiled 4 routes chosen by photographers, and calculated right away how long you should rent a car for each trip.

route1.title: Route #1. "Golden Horseshoe": Aristocratic Aesthetics
route1.locations: Locations: Olesko, Pidhirtsi and Zolochiv castles.
route1.p1: The star of the route is Pidhirtsi Castle. It portrayed the Louvre in the Soviet "Musketeers". It looks monumental and slightly abandoned, giving the shots a special depth.
route1.insight_time: Best time: Second half of the day, closer to sunset ("golden hour"). The sun softly illuminates the palace facade.
route1.insight_angle: Secret angle: Don't shoot point-blank at the entrance. Walk around the castle and go down to the field opposite the south facade. From there you get a panoramic view of the palace on the hill ‚Äî no people in the frame at all.
route1.why_car: Why you need a car here: The car trunk is your mobile dressing room. To take diverse photos (in a flowing dress at the palace and casual style on the fortress walls), you need to carry spare clothes.
route1.rental_text: This is an easy route. The road is excellent (M-06 highway), castles are close. Plan: Pick up the car in the morning, arrive at the castles by lunch, return the car to Lviv in the evening. No point in paying for a second day.

route2.title: Route #2. Tustan and Kamianka Waterfall: Fantasy Set Design
route2.image_alt: Tustan rock fortress ‚Äî unique Lviv region landmark for fantasy photos
route2.locations: Locations: Tustan rock fortress (Urych village), Kamianka waterfall, Zhuravlyne lake.
route2.vibe: Vibe: "The Witcher", Scandinavia, power of nature.
route2.p1: Tustan is a unique monument where a wooden fortress once stood, built right into the rocks. The route usually starts with Kamianka waterfall, and just 500 meters from it hides Zhuravlyne (Dead) lake with black water and mossy shores.
route2.insight_timing: Secret timing: Most buses arrive from 12:00 to 15:00. If you arrive by car at 9:00 AM or stay until 17:00, the rocks will be yours alone.
route2.insight_gastro: Gastro checkpoint: In the clearing near the waterfall, locals cook mushroom soup. Incredibly atmospheric for stories.
route2.why_car: Why you need a car: By public transport this route becomes a challenge: bus to Skhidnytsia, transfer to a minibus to Urych, then more walking. With a rental car you park right at the entrance, saving energy for climbing the rocks.
route2.rental_turbo: "Turbo" option (1 day): Early departure (08:00), active sightseeing of all locations and late evening return.
route2.rental_relax: "Relax" option (2 days): Take it easy, stay overnight in Skhidnytsia (20 km from the rocks), drink mineral water and return to Lviv in the morning.

route3.title: Route #3. Tarakaniv Fort: Post-Apocalypse
route3.vibe: Vibe: Abandoned world, stalker vibes, mystery.
route3.p1: Massive 19th-century defensive structures swallowed by the forest. Red brick entwined with green ivy, dark tunnels and arches ‚Äî the texture is incredible.
route3.insight_time: Best time: Cloudy weather or fog works in your favor here ‚Äî enhances the mystique.
route3.insight_bring: What to bring: A powerful flashlight (for illuminating dark arches) and comfortable shoes.
route3.why_car: Why you need a car here: This is a hard-to-reach location, you have to drive on a dirt road from the highway. Plus, after damp casemates you'll want to change into dry clothes.
route3.rental_text: Location is 1.5‚Äì2 hours drive from Lviv on a good highway. Tip: On the way you can stop at Lubart Castle (Lutsk city), making the trip 100% packed. One day is quite enough for the road trip.

route4.title: Route #4. Road Trip to the Heart of the Carpathians: Synevir, Shypit and Bears
route4.locations: Locations: Volovets Pass, Shypit waterfall, Lake Synevir, Bear Rehabilitation Center.
route4.vibe: Vibe: Ukrainian "Twin Peaks", ancient firs, wilderness.
route4.p1: A full expedition through Volovets Pass, where clouds cling to the car roof. Synevir itself is high in the mountains, and nearby ‚Äî Shypit waterfall and the Brown Bear Rehabilitation Center.
route4.insight_fog: Fog hunting: The most mystical shots at Synevir are taken at sunrise (6:00 to 8:00 AM). At this time steam hangs over the water, and there are no people.
route4.why_car: Logistics: By public transport this route takes three days with lots of transfers. By car it's a comfortable journey.
route4.rental_text: Going here for one day is exhausting (too much time on the road). Ideal plan: Rent a car for 2‚Äì3 days. Drive at a relaxed pace, stay overnight in an authentic mountain cottage, catch sunrise at the lake without tourists and return in comfort.

conclusion.title: How to Plan Your Trip?
conclusion.p1: The main secret of a successful trip and beautiful shots is timing. You shouldn't depend on the train station schedule. You should depend only on light and weather.

list.item1: Want to catch sunrise in the mountains?
list.item2: Want to stay on the castle wall until sunset?
list.item3: Want to bring three outfits and props?

conclusion.cta: Rent a car at REIZ, punch the coordinates into your navigator and create your best memories (and content). The roads are waiting!
